question: Where are TAR UMT campuses located?
answer:
TAR UMT has multiple campuses across Malaysia:

- **Main Campus (Kuala Lumpur, Setapak)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/4H2YzX7Z6dK2)
- **Penang Branch (Tanjung Bungah)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/9v3F3z7r6r92)
- **Perak Branch (Kampar)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v)
- **Johor Branch (Segamat)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v)
- **Pahang Branch (Kuantan)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v)
- **Sabah Branch (Kota Kinabalu)**: [Google Maps](https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v)

question: What are the office hours?
answer:
Administrative offices hours for all campuses:

- Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 1:00 PM
- Closed on Sundays and public holidays

question: How do I get to the TAR UMT campuses by public transport?
answer:
Public transport options for each campus:

- **Main Campus (Kuala Lumpur, Setapak)**:
  - LRT: Wangsa Maju Station (5 min walk)
  - Bus: Multiple routes to Setapak area
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/4H2YzX7Z6dK2

- **Penang Branch (Tanjung Bungah)**:
  - Bus: Rapid Penang routes 101, 102, 103, 104
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/9v3F3z7r6r92

- **Perak Branch (Kampar)**:
  - Bus: Kampar local bus services to campus area
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v

- **Johor Branch (Segamat)**:
  - Bus: Johor Bahru intercity buses to Segamat, then taxi/Grab
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v

- **Pahang Branch (Kuantan)**:
  - Bus: Kuantan local bus or express bus to campus area
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v

- **Sabah Branch (Kota Kinabalu)**:
  - Bus: Kota Kinabalu local bus routes
  - Taxi/Grab: Widely available
  - Google Maps: https://goo.gl/maps/2V7g5Jk8s9v
